title: A Java Exception has occurred
author: A402802443
txt_content:
我把forge装进了minecraft.jar文件以后就出现
A Java Exception has occurred
的警告，求解决方法

replies.author: chychy1
replies.txt_content: 是不是没把minecraft.jar里的META-INF文件夹删掉？

replies.author: A402802443
replies.txt_content: 额。。。。刚刚装的fml诶，算了，试一下

replies.author: A402802443
replies.txt_content:
chychy1 发表于 2013-4-2 18:16 
是不是没把minecraft.jar里的META-INF文件夹删掉？
呀，还真行。。。。谢谢了
